actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A bill to extend until November 1, 1978, the existing exemption of the steamboat Delta Queen from certain vessel laws.

summary.text: Extends until November 1, 1978, the existing exemption of the steamboat Delta Queen from vessel laws requiring fire-retardant material to be used in the construction of large vessels. (Amends 46 U.S.C. 369(b))

titles.title: A bill to extend until November 1, 1978, the existing exemption of the steamboat Delta Queen from certain vessel laws.
